name: Bay Area Cancer Connections
description: If you are new to BACC, please call BACC’s Helpline at 650-326-6686 before joining one of the programs virtually or by phone. Bay Area Cancer Connections (BACC) has a variety of personalized programs and services to support people affected by breast and ovarian cancer. One of their programs is the Breast and Ovarian Cancer Emergency Fund.
